Responsive Sketches

RWD isn't magically going to tackle all of the challenges web designers face, but I think it's brilliant that there is a design approach that requires us as designers to think about accessibility and inclusiveness from the get go.

On Perseverance

Attending The Iron Yard is one of the most demanding, challenging, inspiring, and rewarding experiences I've ever had. I'm just over two weeks in and I'm amazed by how much I've learned, and how much more I'll learn in the next two and a half months.
